snippet: Two University of Rochester students were rescued by a SWAT team a day after being taken hostage, the police said.
abstract: University of Rochester students Nicholas Kollias and Ani Okeke Ewo are rescued by SWAT team day after being abducted and held hostage in home four miles from university; police arrest four people.
lead_paragraph: Two University of Rochester students were rescued by a SWAT team a day after being taken hostage, the police said.
